properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; Pentwater to Manistee MI; Grand Haven to Whitehall MI; South Haven to Holland MI; Holland to Grand Haven MI; Whitehall to Pentwater MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 4:00AM EST until January 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 20 to 25 knots with
gusts up to 35 knots and waves 6 to 10 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 20 knots with gusts up to
30 knots and waves 3 to 6 feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Manistee.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 PM this afternoon to 1 AM
EST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM EST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be this evening
with the passage of an Arctic cold front. Freezing spray will
develop behind the front tonight.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY
